00021 class io_error : public std::ios_base::failure
00022 {
00023 public:
00024     io_error () throw () : std::ios_base::failure("") { }
00025     io_error (const std::string & msg_) throw () :
00026         std::ios_base::failure(msg_)
00027     { }
00028 };

00031 {
00032 public:
00033     resource_error () throw () : std::runtime_error("") { }
00034     resource_error (const std::string & msg_) throw () :
00035         std::runtime_error(msg_)
00036     { }
